title: Christmas Gifts Are Being Delivered, Biden Says
sub_head: President touts progress in easing supply-chain woes as businesses race to get products to market and shoppers face high prices
body:
WASHINGTON—President Biden predicted a gift-filled Christmas for Americans this year despite elevated prices and backups at ports.
“Packages are moving. Gifts are being delivered. Shelves are not empty,” Mr. Biden said Wednesday as he met with members of his supply-chain task force and business leaders.
